lead_paragraph: For years, President Barack Obama berated Republicans for putting their own political interests ahead of good policy on immigration. In two successive presidential campaigns, he held up Washington's failure to act on immigration as a prime example of the cynical decision-making he said must end in Washington.

headline.main: Analysis: Politics Trump Promises on Immigration
headline.print_headline: Analysis: Politics Trump Promises on Immigration
